'''Trixiebell Harrowell''' is an actress known for ''Sherlock'' (2010), ''Bad Sugar'' (2012), and ''A Cake for Mabel'' (2013).

She appeared in the [[Season 4|fourth season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' as [[Sally]], a farmer's daughter. She appeared in the episode "[[Breaker of Chains]]".<ref>http://winteriscoming.net/2013/08/sightings-round-up-another-young-actress-cast-for-s4/</ref>
